para.text: If you have just installed Dolphin Smalltalk and are new to the system then you can follow this guided tour of the development environment to bring yourself up to speed.
In general, we'll assume that you are familiar with the Smalltalk language (if not then see the

below) and that you've probably used another Smalltalk environment in the past. You'll find that the Dolphin development tools are easy-to-use and highly integrated with the Windows operating system, employing the latest native widgets (Windows controls) throughout.
Dolphin has the look and feel of a modern development environment and we hope that this will provide you with the freedom of expression that you expect from the Smalltalk language.
